name: es6-express-mongoose-starter
description: Express & Mongoose starter kit written in ES6 for NodeJS.
author: Patrick Valer <hello@patrickvaler.ch>

scripts.serve: NODE_ENV=dev nodemon src/server.js --exec "npm run linter -s && babel-node"
scripts.build: NODE_ENV=prod npm run linter -s && npm run test && babel src --out-dir build
scripts.test: npm run linter -s && NODE_ENV=test mocha --timeout 30000 --compilers js:babel-register
